word: Not to Be Enslaved by Inheritance.--The question for us to consider is, Have we the attributes of Christ? Excuses are valueless. All circumstances, all appetites and passions, are to be servants to the God-fearing man, not rulers over him. The Christian is not to be enslaved by any hereditary or cultivated habits or tendency.--SpT Series A, No. 9, p 56, 1897. (TM 421.)
